settings.title: Image with text
settings.text_block: Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: The Atavique Collection
settings.text: A curated selection of rare and collectible wines for the discerning collector. Impeccable provenance and free shipping.

settings.title: About
settings.richtext: Organic & natural wines, offered daily. Exclusive deals on the finest collectible and rare wine.

settings.newsletter_description: BE THE FIRST TO KNOW – SIGN UP FOR THE MAILING LIST HERE!

settings.title: Today's Offer
settings.text: Don't miss out on this one-of-a-kind cabernet sauvignon

settings.title: Poolside Whites
settings.text: A six bottle collection of brisk, dry, minerally white wines, perfect for the porch or the pool.

settings.title: Juicy, Sumptuous Reds
settings.text: Six robust, balanced red wines made for both the cellar and immediate pleasure.

settings.title: The Dinner Party
settings.text: Our most popular club! One sparkling, two whites, and three reds. Crafted to be paired with food and friends.

settings.title: The Bubble Club
settings.text: Who doesn’t love bubbles?! Six unique, natural, lip-smacking sparklers from around the globe.

settings.title: Custom Orders
settings.text: Get in touch for curated, custom clubs or special events for your office
